content.title: Return & Exchange Policy
content.intro: Not totally satisfied with your purchase? We want to make it right.

related.title: Returning Purchases Made at a DSW Canada Store
Returning Purchases Made Online at www.dsw.canada.ca
Returning Purchases to DSW.com
Exchanging Purchases to DSW.com
Returning or Exchanging at a DSW Store
International Returns & Exchanges
Returns Policy for Final Sale Items
Rewards Certificates Used on Returned Items
Shipping Your Return or Exchange Within the U.S.

content.extendedContent:
### Where can I return my items?

- Items purchased at dsw.com can be returned or exchanged at dsw.com or any DSW store. If you've paid with PayPal, exchanges should be done in store, if possible. 
- Items purchased in a DSW store can be returned or exchanged at any DSW store. Sorry, but items purchased at DSW stores cannot be returned to dsw.com. 
- Items purchased in a DSW Canada store or at dsw.ca cannot be returned at dsw.com or a DSW store. Contact the DSW Canada store or visit [www.dswcanada.ca](http://www.dswcanada.ca/ "DSW Canada") to learn about their return policies.

### Condition of Returned Items
You may return product for any reason within 60 days of the original purchase date. Merchanidise must be:

- Unworn
- In original packaging
- With the original shipping invoice

### Exclusions
Final Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged.

DSW may limit the number of in-store returns permitted without a valid receipt. Valid ID (driver's license, passport, military ID, or state issued photo ID card) is required for all returns without a valid receipt.

### Return Shipping Costs


|  -  | www.dsw.com      | DSW Store     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------- |
| Returns       | $8.50       | Free       |
| Exchanges | Free | Free |
| Paid with DSW Rewards Visa®       | Free       | Free       |


Returns and exchanges in DSW stores are always free. 

When you return your purchase to www.dsw.com, an $8.50 shipping fee will be deducted from your refund. If you paid for your purchase with a DSW Rewards Visa® credit card, returns to dsw.com are free.

When you exchange an item at www.dsw.com, your return shipping is free and you won't be charged a shipping rate for the new order. 

### Refunds
You may return products for any reason within 60 days of the original purchase date to receive a full merchandise refund via your original form of payment (including PayPal). Please allow 7-10 days to process your return and credit your original form of payment.

Items purchased with any DSW Rewards certificates or offer codes may result in an adjusted refund amount. Certificates are credited back to the customer's account as points after a return is completed.

If you used a combination of PayPal and gift card to make your purchase, your entire purchase will be refunded onto a gift card.

Returns made after 60 days with an invoice will be offered a DSW eGift Card equal to a full merchandise refund, no matter what your original form of tender. Returns made without an invoice will be offered a DSW eGift Card equal to the current selling price of the merchandise.

Exchanges made within 60 days will receive credit for any difference owed in the original form of payment. Exchanges made after 60 days will be issued a DSW merchandise credit for any difference owed. DSW Rewards certificates and offers can be reissued when you make an exchange within 60 days.

### Gifts
If you received your item as a gift, please note that a refund will only be credited to the card that was used to make the purchase.

You may exchange items you received as a gift, with any leftover funds being issued to you in the form of a DSW eGift Card.

When you return your purchase to wwwdswcom an 850 shipping fee will be deducted from your refund If you paid for your purchase with a DSW Rewards Visa® credit card returns to dswcom are free

When you exchange an item at wwwdswcom your return shipping is free and you won't be charged a shipping rate for the new order 

 Refunds
You may return products for any reason within 60 days of the original purchase date to receive a full merchandise refund via your original form of payment including PayPal Please allow 710 days to process your return and credit your original form of payment

Items purchased with any DSW Rewards certificates or offer codes may result in an adjusted refund amount Certificates are credited back to the customer's account as points after a return is completed

You may exchange items you received as a gift with any leftover funds being issued to you in the form of a DSW eGift Card

content.title: Shipping Options
content.disclaimer: * For orders over $35. Standard shipping is $7.95 for orders under $35 .

fields.title: Why can't my order be expedited?
fields.content: DSW tries to offer a range of shipping options so you can get your items as quickly as you need them. However, some items ship from an alternate location and may not be eligible for rush shipping options.

fields.title: Track Your Order
fields.content: As soon as your order ships, we email you with your estimated delivery date, your order's current status, and a button to track your order.
fields.extendedContent:
If we shipped your order in multiple packages, we'll send an email for each package with details about which items are in which packages. (We never charge extra for additional packages.) 

Please note that it can take extra time for deliveries to reach remote locations and APOs/FPOs. Also, we occasionally delay randomly-selected shipments for extra security verification.

content.title: Earning a Rewards Certificate
content.content: Rewards certificates are earned by purchasing items from DSW stores using your Rewards member number or on dsw.com by logging into your Rewards account. For every $150 spent, you earn a $10 rewards certificate. Rewards certificates are issued weekly.
content.extendedContent: If we have your email address or mobile phone number on file, you will receive an email or text notification when certificates are credited to your account. You can also see your available certificates any time by logging in to you dsw.com account.

search.title: Earning a Rewards Certificate
search.content: Rewards certificates are earned by purchasing items from DSW stores using your Rewards member number or on dswcom by logging into your Rewards account For every 150 spent you earn a 10 rewards certificate Rewards certificates are issued weekly
search.extendedContent: If we have your email address or mobile phone number on file you will receive an email or text notification when certificates are credited to your account You can also see your available certificates any time by logging in to you dswcom account

content.title: The DSW Rewards Program
content.content: DSW Rewards is a free loyalty program that allows members to earn points with every purchase. Earn enough points and you'll get a DSW Rewards certificate for $10 off your next purchase in stores or online.
content.extendedContent:
Enjoy these benefits by becoming a DSW Rewards member:

* Points on your purchases to earn DSW Rewards certificates
* Double Points events two times per year to help  you earn certificates faster  
* A special birthday offer
* Exclusive access to the DSW Rewards Visa®
* The opportunity to earn even more benefits with DSW Rewards Premier
* Personalized DSW Favorites to share with friends and family

content.title: In-Store Pickup
content.content: Some items offered on our website are available for free same-day pickup at a nearby DSW store. Some items are also available for our ship-to-store service, where we ship the item to be picked up at the DSW store of your choice.
content.extendedContent:
Not all items are available for these services, nor are these services available in all stores. For same-day pickup, your order must be submitted by 6 p.m. local time or four hours before closing, whichever is earlier, and the item must be available at the DSW store you selected. Ship-to-store items are not available for same-day pickup.

We will notify you via email when your order is ready for pickup.

We will notify you via email when your order is ready for pickup

content.title: DSW Gift Cards
content.content: Send the gift that always fits. If you buy a gift card, we'll ship it to your recipient in a DSW greeting card for free using USPS mail. Or send an eGift Card by mail and you can schedule your delivery.

content.title: Returning or Exchanging at a DSW Store
content.content: You may return or exchange unworn merchandise at a DSW store for immediate credit, whether you made your original purchase at a DSW store or at dsw.com. Simply bring in your unworn merchandise in the original packaging, along with your receipt or invoice and the original form of payment.
content.extendedContent:
Purchases returned without a receipt or invoice will be issued a DSW merchandise credit equal to the current selling price of the product. DSW may limit the number of returns permitted without a valid receipt. Valid ID (driver's license, passport, military ID, or state issued photo ID card) is required for all returns without a valid receipt.

Purchases returned or exchanged within 60 days will receive credit in the original form of payment (including PayPal). Purchases returned or exchanged after 60 days will be issued a DSW merchandise credit only.

If you're returning a gift you received, you'll be issued a DSW merchandise credit only.

If you're returning a purchase made with any DSW Rewards certificates or offers, you will be refunded only the final purchase price. Certificates and offers will not be reissued or recredited, except for exchanges made within 60 days of purchase.

If you used a combination of PayPal and gift card to make your purchase, your entire purchase will be refunded onto a gift card. Exchanges should be done in store, if possible, as shoephoria! Center representatives are not authorized to log into your PayPal account to make a new purchase for you.

content.title: Redeeming Your Rewards Certificates
content.content: Rewards certificates can be redeemed in our stores by providing the store associate with your Rewards member number. They can also be redeemed on dsw.com by logging into your Rewards account and applying your available certificates during checkout.
content.extendedContent: If you are a Premier member and are not receiving notifications about certificates, check to see if points banking is turned on. If so, turn off points banking and you will have access to your earned certificates.

content.title: Eligibility for In-Store Pickup
content.content: When an item on our site is eligible for in-store pickup, you will be able to select either "Free Pick Up Today" or "Free Ship to Store" from the product page.
content.extendedContent: Not all items are available for these services, nor are these services available in all stores. The DSW In-Store Pickup service is not currently available in Puerto Rico.

content.title: Shipping Your Return or Exchange Within the U.S.
content.content: There are two ways you can ship your merchandise back to dsw.com. You can use the prepaid FedEx return label enclosed in the dsw.com box, or ship your package back using your preferred carrier.
content.extendedContent:
#### Using the Pre-Paid FedEx Service
Simply repack your items, apply the FedEx return label, and drop off the package at a FedEx Authorized ShipCenter or FedEx Office. If you need help finding a a FedEx location, please visit fedex.com. A return shipping fee of $8.50 will be applied.

#### Using Your Preferred Shipping Carrier__
Repack your items, and use your preferred carrier to ship the package back to us at:

dsw.com
ATTN: Returns Processing
4314 East 5th Avenue
Columbus, OH 43219

No return shipping fee will be applied when you use your preferred shipping carrier.

content.title: Tracking Your Order
content.content: When your order ships, we email you with an estimated delivery date, your order's current status, and a link to track your order. If we shipped your order in multiple packages, we'll sent an email for each package with details about which items are in it.
content.extendedContent: You can also get delivery updates sent to you by Facebook Messenger or text message. You can sign up by following the tracking link in your email and opting in.

search.extendedContent: You can also get delivery updates sent to you by Facebook Messenger or text message You can sign up by following the tracking link in your email and opting in

content.title: Using Order or Promotion Codes
content.content: Offers and promotion codes can be applied during checkout. Some of our offer codes are available for in-store and online use, while others are only valid for one or the other. (Be sure to check the offer details to verify all redemption info.)
content.extendedContent:
Some of our offer codes aren't able to be shared—they're intended for specific customers only. Because of this, all offer codes may not work for all customers.

Most of the time, you're required to be logged in to your dsw.com account to redeem offer codes or Rewards certificates. So, please [log in](https://www.dsw.com/en/us/sign-in "DSW Shoes Website Login Page") before or during checkout.

Some items and brands are excluded from offers and promotions, including adidas, Birkenstock, Brooks, Converse, Keen, Nike, Rainbow, Sorel, Ugg, and Under Armour.

content.title: Setting Up Your Rewards Account Online
content.content: If you recently signed up for a DSW Rewards account in store, you should have received a welcome email with a temporary password. Click the link within the email to set up a permanent password for your online account.
content.extendedContent: If you no longer have the welcome email, go to [dsw.com](https://www.dsw.com "DSW website") and click the account icon. Choose "Forgot Password" and follow the instructions to set up a permanent password for your online account.

content.title: Checking Your Gift Card Balance
content.content: You can check your gift card balance in a DSW store, by calling 1-888-895-2504, or online at any time. To check your balance, you'll need your gift card number and your PIN.

search.title: Checking Your Gift Card Balance

content.title: Ordering for In-Store Pickup When the Store Is Closed
content.content: If the item is available for in-store pickup at the time of your order, it will be ready the next day at open of business. Ship-to-store orders will be available within 4–7 days.
content.extendedContent: With all orders, wait until you receive the "Ready for Pickup" email before picking up your order.

search.title: Ordering for InStore Pickup When the Store Is Closed
search.content: If the item is available for instore pickup at the time of your order it will be ready the next day at open of business Shiptostore orders will be available within 4–7 days
search.extendedContent: With all orders wait until you receive the "Ready for Pickup" email before picking up your order

content.title: Splitting an Order Between Shipping and In-Store Pickup
content.content: It's simple to have some items shipped to you and pick up the rest of your order in store.
content.extendedContent:
#### Step 1
__For items you would like shipped__, simply select "Free Standard Shipping" and "Add to Bag" on the product page. (You will be able to select faster shipping options at checkout.)
 
#### Step 2
__For any other item(s) you would like to pick up in store,__ select either "Free Pick Up Today" or "Free Ship to Store." 

#### Step 3
__Proceed to checkout__ to review your total order. Your shopping bag will show items for delivery and items for in-store pickup.
content.extendedContentLink: How to Split Your Order Between Shipping and In-Store Pickup

For items you would like shipped simply select "Free Standard Shipping" and "Add to Bag" on the product page You will be able to select faster shipping options at checkout
 
 Step 2
For any other items you would like to pick up in store select either "Free Pick Up Today" or "Free Ship to Store" 

 Step 3
Proceed to checkout to review your total order Your shopping bag will show items for delivery and items for instore pickup

content.title: Exchanging Purchases to DSW.com
content.content: We offer free exchanges to dsw.com every day. Just fill out the provided Return & Exchange Form to indicate your replacement item, then use the included Shipping Label to send your order back to us. We'll exchange your old item(s) and send your new item(s) back to you, and you will not be charged any shipping fees!
content.extendedContent:
Exchanges are processed like a return and reissued as a new order. You'll receive a credit for the items you're sending back and a separate charge for the exchange order placed. 

Exchanges made within 60 days will receive credit for any difference owed in the original form of payment. Exchanges made after 60 days will be issued a DSW merchandise credit for any difference owed. You may exchange items you received as a gift, with any leftover funds being issued to you in the form of a DSW eGift Card.

If you've paid with PayPal, exchanges should be done in store if possible. shoephoria! Center representatives are not authorized to log into your PayPal account to make a new purchase for you. DSW Rewards certificates and offers can be reissued when you make an exchange within 60 days.

related.title: Return & Exchange Policy
Shipping Your Return or Exchange Within the U.S.

content.title: Changing the Store for In-Store Pickup
content.content: When the product page indicates that an item is eligible for in-store pickup, follow the "Change Store" link to select where to have your order delivered.
content.extendedContent: You cannot change stores after you have placed an order for in-store pickup. In this case, please call customer service at 1.866.379.7463. We're happy to help.

related.title: Contact Us

content.title: Using 'My Favorites'
content.content: If you are a DSW Rewards member, you can save your Favorites. It's an amazing way to keep track of what you love, save it for later, get updates, and share with friends and family.
content.extendedContent:
#### Step 1
Log in with your DSW Rewards membership. Not a member? [Create an account](https://www.dsw.com/en/us/sign-in "DSW Shoes Website Login Page").

#### Step 2
Add things you want to save as Favorites using the heart icon on the product image.

#### Step 3
View your Favorites list by going to your account and clicking the heart icon.

#### Step 4
Buy something from your Favorites list by simply clicking "Add to Bag" and checking out as usual.

content.title: Your Order Status
content.content: We'll update your order status on your tracking page as your package makes its way to you.
content.extendedContent:
Here are some statuses you might see.

####In Process
Your order is still in the warehouse. During this time, we find your items, pack them, and give them a shipping label with a tracking number.
####On Its Way
Your order has shipped. It still has a day or more to go before it reaches you. 
####Out for Delivery
Your order is in your area and should be delivered by the end of the day.
####Delivered
Your order has arrived and been dropped off at your shipping address or pick-up location. 
####Picked Up
Your order has been picked up from a pick-up location where it had been held.
####Undeliverable
Your order couldn't be delivered.

search.content: We'll update your order status on your tracking page as your package makes its way to you
search.extendedContent:

Your order is still in the warehouse During this time we find your items pack them and give them a shipping label with a tracking number
On Its Way
Your order has shipped It still has a day or more to go before it reaches you 
Out for Delivery
Your order is in your area and should be delivered by the end of the day
Delivered
Your order has arrived and been dropped off at your shipping address or pickup location 
Picked Up
Your order has been picked up from a pickup location where it had been held
Undeliverable
Your order couldn't be delivered

content.title: International Returns & Exchanges
content.content:
Simply follow the steps for domestic returns and exchanges to DSW.com, then use your preferred shipping carrier to ship the package back to us at:

dsw.com
ATTN: Returns Processing
4314 East 5th Avenue
Columbus, OH 43219
content.extendedContent:
Note that the prepaid FedEx return label cannot be used outside of the United States.

DSW is not able to accept returns or exchanges of merchandise purchased from any DSW Canada store or www.dswcanada.ca. Please contact the DSW Canada store where your purchase was made or visit [www.dswcanada.ca](https://dsw.townshoes.ca/store/) to learn about their return and exchange policies.

content.title: Having Someone Else Do Your In-Store Pickup
content.content: To have a friend or family member do your in-store pickup, simply include their name in the "Alternate Pick-Up Person" section within the payment page.
content.extendedContent:
Your alternate pick-up person will get all emails associated with your order, so they'll know when your order is ready for pick-up too. 

If you select an alternate pick-up person, either you or that person can pick up your order. When picking up your order, you or your alternate pick-up person must show a valid government-issued ID and the order confirmation number.

content.title: Accepting 'Cookies' on DSW.com
content.content: DSW.com uses a browser feature known as a cookie, which is typically stored on your computer. Cookies help track your preferences as you go through the pages within our website. We may also use cookies to assist in the administration of your use of features and programs on our site.
content.extendedContent:
We also use a technology known as "clear gifs" which are typically stored in emails to help us confirm your receipt of, and response to, our emails and to provide you a more personalized experience. If you sign up for the online features of our website, cookies may allow us to associate your navigational information with your registration information.

You may refuse cookies by turning them off in your browser. However, if you refuse cookies, we will not be able to track your order, nor will we be able to recognize you as a registered dsw.com user to allow you access to your account information.

You may refuse cookies by turning them off in your browser However if you refuse cookies we will not be able to track your order nor will we be able to recognize you as a registered dswcom user to allow you access to your account information

content.title: What to Bring to an In-Store Pickup
content.content: Please be sure to bring a government-issued ID (driver's license, military ID, passport, social security card, or birth certificate) and your order confirmation number.

search.title: What to Bring to an InStore Pickup

content.title: Your 'Ready for Pickup' Notification
content.content:
You will be notified with a "Ready for Pickup" email when your order is ready for in-store pickup. Please wait until you receive this email before attempting to pick up your order.

Need to know your store's hours? Check out our [Store Locator](http://stores.dsw.com/ "Store Locater on DSW Shoes Website").

content.title: Checking Your Order Details
content.content: First, sign in to your [Account](https://www.dsw.com/en/us/sign-in "DSW Shoes Website Login Page"). There, you'll be able to see your order details and shipping information. After your order ships, we'll email you with your tracking information and you'll also be able to see it on your Account page.

content.title: When Your Credit Card is Charged for In-Store Pickup Orders
content.content: After you place your order, your card will be authorized for the total order amount. When your order is picked up, the transaction will be finalized and your credit card will be charged.

search.title: When Your Credit Card is Charged for InStore Pickup Orders

content.title: Rewards Certificates Used on Returned Items
content.content: Points will be credited back to your Rewards account for all returns. If you return multiple items, the point value associated with each item will be credited separately to your account. You will see the points in your Rewards account within 5-7 business days.

related.title: Rewards Certificates Used on Exchanged Items

content.content: DSW in the United States is not able to accept returns or exchanges of merchandise purchased from any DSW Canada store. For this type of merchandise, please visit [www.dswcanada.ca](https://dsw.townshoes.ca/store/) or contact the DSW Canada store where you made your purchase.

content.title: DSW Rewards Points on Gift Card Purchases
content.content: Gift Cards and e-Gift Cards are the only items at DSW that do not earn DSW Rewards points when purchased. However, if the gift recipient is a DSW Rewards member, that person will earn points when redeeming the Card.

content.title: Tax Policy
content.content: For delivery orders, your tax is calculated based on the tax code where your order is delivered. For in-store pickup orders, your tax is calculated based on the tax code of the store location. If you have an order with one item for delivery and one for in-store pickup you could be charged different tax rates.

content.title: Sharing Your Favorites
content.content: It’s easy to share your Favorites on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, email and text. While on your Favorites page, simply check the items you would like to share, choose “Share” at the top, then copy the link or email your Favorites.

content.title: Leave Your Mark
content.content: At DSW, community and giving matters. Our philanthropic platform, Shoe Loves Care, gives back with a variety of programs including Leave Your Mark — a program that allows associates to nominate nonprofit organizations to receive $75,000 from DSW.
content.extendedContent: After the non-profits are nominated, associates, fans, and Shoe Lovers everywhere vote to choose the nonprofit that will receive the donation. This past fall, Fresno Bully Rescue received the most votes earning the top donation of $75,000, while the other finalists organization each received a donation for $5,000. Check out ShoeLoversCare.com to see photos and video from all of the check presentations — and get ready for the next round in June!
